column4: Does anyone know anything about getting sound to work in Ubuntu 11?  I select the sound for my front speaker (Analog Output (LFE)) but it keeps going back to (Analog Headphones).
I was running Ubuntu an earlier Ubuntu and sound worked before I upgraded my hard drive and Ubuntu.
Also worked in Mint and PCLOS which are based on Ubuntu.
analog stereo  Duplex is what i selected... i had that problem
